title: Hour 1: Open Book
description:
In this episode, Stephen A. is joined by Bart Scott to react to breaking news about Russell Wilson's new deal with Denver and they debate what this means for Lamar Jackson in his contract negotiations. Alexandra Stevenson joins us live from the US Open to talk Serena as she advances to the 3rd round. Plus, Stephen A. and Bart debate who has greater Super Bowl odds: the Bills or the Rams?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Can Serena Williams win the US Open?
